steps.description: Modify `agent.buildProject` in `agent.go` to use a hardcoded build command string instead of recalling it from memory. Remove related memory manager calls and potentially the memory package import if no longer needed in this file.
acceptance: The `buildProject` function in `agent.go` no longer initializes `memory.New` or calls `mgr.GetMemoryByID`.
The `fullBuildCommand` variable in `buildProject` is assigned the hardcoded string `go build -tags fts5 -o smolcode cmd/smolcode/main.go`.
The `github.com/dhamidi/smolcode/memory` import is removed from `agent.go` if it was solely used by the previous `buildProject` logic.

steps.description: Build the project to verify the changes and logically confirm the updated behavior.
acceptance: The project builds successfully using `go build -tags fts5 -o smolcode cmd/smolcode/main.go`.
A logical review confirms the `/reload` command's build step now uses the hardcoded command.
